name: Institut Català de la Vinya i el Vi
legal: autonomous administrative entity of the Generalitat of Catalonia
goal:
Analysis of wines and derivatives and issuance of certificates at the request of individuals and organizations. It acts as a technical advisory body of the regulatory boards of the Appellations of Origin of wine production in Catalonia and the sector in general.
Promote the improvement of vineyard cultivation and the quality of the wines and other products derived therefrom.
Promotion of the knowledge and good use of Catalan wines at the level of consumption, contributing to its correct assessment.
Study, investigation and experimentation of the processes, the techniques, the materials and other aspects related to the vitivinícola production.
Specialization, recycling and refinement of technicians and professionals in the field of wine and wine.
Collaboration in the realization of studies, censuses, inventories, cadastres and statistics related to the wine sector.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Modification of the wine law in project. Modifications of
specifications of protected designations of origin. Collaboration in research and development projects in the wine sector.
